species.name: diggersby
descriptions: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it’s finished digging, it lounges lazily.
The fur on its belly retains heat exceptionally well. People used to make heavy winter clothing from fur shed by this Pokémon.
With power equal to an excavator, it can dig through dense bedrock. It’s a huge help during tunnel construction.
With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

abilities.name: cheek-pouch
abilities.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.
